revised_title: Improved Wave Function Calculation for the Ground State of Beryllium Atom
tldr: The authors present a new method for calculating the wave function of the ground state of the beryllium atom using a linear combination of Slater determinants and the variational method. This method provides a more accurate result than the Hartree method and can be extended to atoms with more than two electrons, offering a more powerful and convenient approach for atomic wave function calculations.
